select
from car_evaluate_data d
left join car_auto_detection_data dd on d.id = d.obj_id left join car_auto a on dd.auto_id = a.id
left join car_locale_auction au on au.id = d.obj_id
left join car_order o on o.id = d.obj_id left join car_auto a on a.id = o.car_id left join car_auto_auction aa on aa.auto_id = a.id
left join car_auto a on a.id = d.obj_id left join car_auto_auction aa on aa.auto_id = a.id
and d.`type` = #{type}
and d.`objId` = #{objId}
and a.store_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{storeName}),'%')
and au.title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and au.start_time >= str_to_date(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and au.start_time <= str_to_date(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and aa.auction_type = #{auctionType}
limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}
